Header: SC to announce verdict on Duminda Silvaâ€™s appeals petition on 11th
Content: The Supreme Court today said that the verdict on the appeals petition filed by five persons including Parliamentarian Duminda Silva who are sentenced to death will be announced on the 11th of this month. They were sentenced to death after being convicted in the murder of four persons including former Parliamentarian Baratha Lakshman Premachandra.
